rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 8 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:06 AM, 20 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon, Bulacan, Nueva Ecija, Rizal and Laguna within the next 2-3 hours.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
